text: Jacques Rivette (; 1 March 1928 - 29 January 2016) was a French movie director, screenwriter and movie critic. His best-known movies include Celine and Julie Go Boating, La Belle Noiseuse and the rare thirteen-hour Out 1. He was one of the main member of French cinema magazine Cahiers du Cinema. Rivette died at his home in Paris, France from complications of Alzheimer's disease on 29 January 2016 at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *jacques-rivette.com- a website devoted to Rivette's film and journalism careers *Biography on newwavefilm.com *sensesofcinema.com Great Directors article *Jonathan Rosenbaum: Jacques Rivette [chapter from FILM: THE FRONT LINE 1983] * Edition de « De l'abjection » (1961) par Jacques Rivette, sur le site d'analyse L'oBservatoire (simple appareil). title: Jacques Rivette
